The Titans are a team the Colts know well, but with a new rookie quarterback in first overall pick Cam […]

items.title: Colts, Spencer Shrader make best of difficult situation; Indy 2-0

The Colts are out the gate to their first 2-0 start since their […]

items.title: Colts shed ghosts of early seasons’ past, improving to 2-0 with thrilling win against Broncos

items.title: Shrader's kick propels Colts to 29-28 win and 2-0 start
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS — Spencer Shrader kicked a 45-yard, game-winning field goal as time expired to lift the Indianapolis Colts to a 29-28 win over the Denver Broncos on Sunday afternoon. The Colts are now 2-0 for the first time since 2009. Shrader missed a 60-yard attempt before his 45-yarder, but the Broncos were flagged for leverage. [...]

items.title: Week 2 Colts vs. Broncos Game Thread
items.summary: The Indianapolis Colts are at home to take on the Denver Broncos in week 2 of the 2025 season, kickoff is at 4:05 p.m. EST. Whew. Week one was one for the record books. Daniel Jones led the Colts offense to seven straight scoring drives, the first time that’s happened for an NFL team since the mid-1970’s. […]

Jones, a 2023 seventh-round draft pick, started 27 games in his first two seasons - [...]

items.title: Practice notebook: Colts' cornerback depth comes into focus with Charvarius Ward Sr. in concussion protocol, Jaylon Jones out

items.title: How Daniel Jones, Shane Steichen and the Colts' offense threw a near-perfect game in Week 1 blowout win over Dolphins
